[ti:Arcade (Sam Feldt Remix)]

[al:Sommerhits 2021 - Dansk Sommer (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]Arcade (Sam Feldt Remix) - Duncan Laurence
[00:00.86]Lyrics by：Wouter Hardy/Duncan Laurence/Joel Sjöö/Will Knox
[00:01.73]Composed by：Wouter Hardy/Duncan Laurence/Joel Sjöö/Will Knox
[00:02.60]A broken heart is all that's left
[00:05.60]
[00:08.45]I'm still fixing all the cracks
[00:11.30]
[00:14.06]Lost a couple of pieces when
[00:16.76]
[00:19.43]I carried it carried it carried it home
[00:22.48]
[00:25.34]I've spent all of the love I saved
[00:28.28]We were always a losing game
[00:30.80]Small-town boy in a big arcade
[00:33.68]I got addicted to a losing game
[00:36.51]Oh-oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh-oh
[00:41.44]All I know all I know
[00:44.76]Loving you is a losing game
[00:47.49]
[00:50.43]Loving you is a losing game
[00:53.10]
[00:55.92]Loving you is a losing game
[00:58.81]How many pennies in the slot
[01:01.92]
[01:04.26]Giving us up didn't take a lot
[01:07.26]
[01:09.94]I saw the end 'fore it begun
[01:13.06]
[01:15.12]Still I carried I carried I carry on
[01:18.29]
[01:21.19]I've spent all of the love I saved
[01:24.11]We were always a losing game
[01:26.52]Small-town boy in a big arcade
[01:29.62]I got addicted to a losing game
[01:32.24]Oh-oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:37.22]All I know all I know
[01:40.58]Loving you is a losing game
[01:43.38]Oh-oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:48.24]All I know all I know
[01:51.74]Loving you is a losing game
[01:54.42]
[01:57.37]Loving you is a losing game
[01:59.95]
[02:02.86]Loving you is a losing game
[02:05.63]
[02:08.54]Loving you is a losing game
[02:11.15]
[02:14.03]Loving you is a losing game
[02:16.98]Oh-oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:21.78]All I know all I know
[02:25.26]Loving you is a losing game
data.trans:
[ti:Arcade (Sam Feldt Remix)]
[ar:Duncan Laurence]
[al:Sommerhits 2021 - Dansk Sommer (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.86]//
[00:01.73]//
[00:02.60]仅剩一颗破碎的心
[00:05.60]
[00:08.45]我仍在抚平那伤痛
[00:11.30]
[00:14.06]当我将真心夺回时
[00:16.76]
[00:19.43]发现我的心已不再完整
[00:22.48]
[00:25.34]我挥霍了所有辛苦积攒的爱意
[00:28.28]可我们的爱仍然寂寂无终
[00:30.80]明明只是个游乐场里的小城男孩
[00:33.68]可我却迷上了这徒劳的爱情游戏
[00:36.51]//
[00:41.44]尽我所知的是 尽我所知的是
[00:44.76]在这爱里我注定失败
[00:47.49]
[00:50.43]在这爱里我注定失败
[00:53.10]
[00:55.92]在这爱里我注定失败
[00:58.81]投币口里得放几便士？
[01:01.92]
[01:04.26]叫停这爱却花不了多少
[01:07.26]
[01:09.94]纵然伊始 我早已料到结局
[01:13.06]
[01:15.12]可我不想放弃 仍然坚持着
[01:18.29]
[01:21.19]我挥霍了所有辛苦积攒的爱意
[01:24.11]可我们的爱仍然寂寂无终
[01:26.52]明明只是个游乐场里的小城男孩
[01:29.62]可我却迷上了这徒劳的爱情游戏
[01:32.24]//
[01:37.22]尽我所知的是 尽我所知的是
[01:40.58]在这爱里我注定失败
[01:43.38]//
[01:48.24]尽我所知的是 尽我所知的是
[01:51.74]在这爱里我注定失败
[01:54.42]
[01:57.37]在这爱里我注定失败
[01:59.95]
[02:02.86]在这爱里我注定失败
[02:05.63]
[02:08.54]在这爱里我注定失败
[02:11.15]
[02:14.03]在这爱里我注定失败
[02:16.98]//

[02:25.26]在这爱里我注定失败
